# Welcome from Our President
::: vspace
:::

::: president-intro
<p>Welcome to the American Psychology-Law Society (AP-LS), Division 41 of the American Psychological Association.</p>

<p>Our organizational mission is to "enhance well-being, justice, and human rights through the science and practice of psychology in legal contexts." AP-LS is the premiere organization for students and professionals who are interested in issues at the intersection of psychology and law.</p>

<p>As an organization, we strive to support our members in their work using psychological science and practice to advance justice in our legal system.</p>
:::

```{r}
#| include: false
#| echo: false

resource_grid = function(content) {
  div(class = "grid grid-three",
    pmap(content, function(category, name, icon, url, text) {
      div(class = "grid__item",
        h3(class = "grid__title",
          tags$i(class = sprintf("bi-%s grid__title-icon", icon)),
          HTML("&nbsp;"),
          name
        ),
        p(
        paste0(text, "."),
        a(href = url, "aria-label" = sprintf("Go to %s", name), span(class = "grid__link-box"))
        )
      )
    })
  )
}
# Text description should be one sentence
content = rowwise_table(~category, ~name, ~icon, ~url, ~text,
                        "general", "Publications", "journals", "publications/index.html", "Learn about journals, book series, etc. from APA Div. 41..",
   "general", "Newsletter", "newspaper",  "newsletter/index.html", "Read the latest news from our membership..",
    "general", "Job Posts", "briefcase-fill", "resources/job-postings/index.html", "Browse recent job listings..",
      "general", "Community", "person-fill-exclamation", "about/standards.html", "NEW! Learn about the AP-LS Community Standards..",

    "general", "Videos", "play-circle", "resources/videos/index.html", "Collection of webinars, talks and videos..",
      "general", "Past Conferences", "chat-dots", "conferences/archive/index.html", "Browse programs from past AP-LS Conferences.."

)
setkeyv(content, "category")
```



```{r, echo = FALSE}
resource_grid(content[.("general")])
```
